thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Joya Nigro

author: Joya Nigro
title: Joya Nigro
text: As an office manager, I am in charge of ordering lunch daily for 30+ employees. I have used so many different platforms and none has been as consistent as EZcater. It's refreshing to know that your food will be delivered when they say it will be. Catering also helps with the reoccurring problem of restaurants forgetting employees meals and cold, late food. I am very happy that I found this website and my employees are as well.
